definition: to go abroad/to leave the country/emigration

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

pinyin: Shi2 you2 Shu1 chu1 guo2 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: It's much easier to go abroad than before.
sentences.chinese: 如今出國比以前超卓多了。

sentences.english: Studying abroad provides an opportunity to broaden your experience and mind.
sentences.chinese: 出國留學是一個增加閱歷和拓寬思想的良好機會。

sentences.english: The idea that she will go abroad for further study made herself excited.
sentences.chinese: 她一想到就要出國深造，激動不已。

sentences.english: They designed this course to help those who are wishing to go abroad.
sentences.chinese: 他們設計這門課程來幫助想出國的人員。

sentences.english: Tom will go abroad in three years.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆將於三年之後出國。

sentences.english: China is the country that sends the most students abroad for studies and researches.
sentences.chinese: 中國是世界上出國前留學生最多的國家。

sentences.english: It seems that he will be sent abroad next year.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎明年將被派出國。

sentences.english: Behave abroad as you would at home.
sentences.chinese: 出國時應當保持像國內一樣的行爲。

sentences.english: What's the advantage of studying abroad?
sentences.chinese: 出國留學的優勢是什麼呢？

sentences.english: To study abroad is my dream.
I'm still debating with myself whether to let you go abroad alone.
sentences.chinese: 我仍在心中盤算是否讓你獨自出國。

sentences.english: Hiss father sent him abroad to study literature.
sentences.chinese: 他父親送他出國去學文學。

sentences.english: Both of their passports were valid for travel abroad.
sentences.chinese: 兩人的護照對於出國旅遊都是有效的。

sentences.english: B is responsible for staging the pick to go abroad and accommodation arrangements and costs.
sentences.chinese: 負責乙方出國集結地的接機和食宿安排和費用。

sentences.english: to formulate work plans for dispatching representatives of state stock ownership to the state holding and joint-stock corporations.
sentences.chinese: 擬訂向國有控股和參股公司派出國有股權代表的方案。

sentences.english: But at whiles it is not totally the case.
sentences.chinese: 但是有的時間，它否則完全地沒出國疑問把事件解決。

definition: to return to one's home country
to go to school/to attend school
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
(to take) a turn for the better/to change planes
to read a book/to study/to attend school
